column.comment: Amazon Product Id Type (ASIN, UPC, etc)

column.comment: Pricing Update Flag (used for index process)

column.comment: Quantity Update Flag (used for index process)

column.comment: Used in Search Rsults Layered Navigation

column.name: previous_token
column.comment: Last Token used for the API request

column.name: records_fetched
column.comment: Count of total records fetched during the sync

column.name: status
column.comment: Status describing result of the sync

column.name: notes
column.comment: Text field with additional notes related to the sync

column.comment: Time when the record has been created
